articles.title: OPINION: US, NM should act boldly on quantum development
articles.author: Susana Martinez
articles.summary: Eighty years ago, New Mexico played a pivotal role in helping America win a global technology race against an authoritarian power. Today, the adversary is the Chinese Communist Party, which is investing trillions in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and other frontier technologies that will define global power and leadership in the 21st century.

articles.title: Country's AI revolution gets an ‘Adipoli' boost
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Kochi has developed India's first fully designed artificial intelligence (AI) server. The server was developed by Manesar-based techies based in Kochi. It's a proud milestone for Kerala in the country's tech landscape and a major part of Kochi's technological development.

articles.title: ChatGPT can remember more about you than ever before – should you be worried?
articles.author: Becca Caddy
articles.summary: ChatGPT has had a memory feature since 2024. Now OpenAI is rolling out a major upgrade to its memory. It will draw from all of your past conversations to inform future responses by itself. This feature is called long-term or persistent memory and is available to ChatGPT Plus and Pro users. It's not available in the UK, EU, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, or Switzerland.

articles.title: Apple Intelligence vanished off my iPhone, and I barely noticed
articles.summary: Apple Intelligence is available in several languages, but it doesn't work. The Summarize Notifications feature is not active. The most important AI-powered Siri has been delayed indefinitely. There are no new Apple Intelligence features expected before the release of the next version.

The stock has since pulled back amid concerns about a potential economic slowdown spurred by President Trump's tariffs. SoundHound is far from profitable and its net losses expanded last year.

articles.title: Understanding an Artificial Mind: How the 'human psychology' of ChatGPT defines user expectations
articles.summary: ChatGPT is an algorithm that predicts and generates text based on extensive statistical training. Humans tend to anthropomorphize AI and create false psychological profiles for them. This analysis by Milwaukee Independent will explore why humans assign psychological profiles to artificial intelligence, examine real-world cases illustrating user interactions and misconceptions, and argue that recognizing AI's non-human nature is essential for effective and responsible use.

articles.title: An AI by any other name: Why overhyped technology often fails to live up to its lofty promises
articles.author: Mitchell A. Sobieski
articles.summary: The term 'Artificial intelligence' is overused and overhyped. In the 1980s, the term was applied to text-based adventure games and rule-based systems. Today, it's applied to any computer program that exhibits the tiniest bit of adaptability. The shift in the marketing-driven language has real consequences. It sets unrealistic expectations.

articles.title: 7 Farming Robots
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Australian farmers Andrew and Jocie Bate have unveiled a groundbreaking 'autofill' system that allows driverless farm robots to operate entirely independently. The Bates launched their ag-tech startup in 2012 from their 4,000-hectare property in Gindie, central Queensland. The company now has 145 robots working on farms across Australia, with farmers either buying the robots outright or leasing them on a three-year plan. The technology offers numerous benefits, including freeing up farmers' time for family and reducing their exposure to harmful chemicals.

The state House created a new Communications & Technology Committee that will have a hand in reviewing most AI-related proposals. articles.title: Councils could use new AI tool to ‘digitise records and cut planning backlogs'
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph
articles.summary: Councils are expected to start using a new artificial intelligence soon. It is based on a new machine learning technology developed by IBM Watson.    for the city councils in the U.S. and for local authorities around the world.  For more information, visit: www.councils.org.

articles.title: ChatGPT's Creepy Personalization: AI Chatbot Sparks Privacy Fears by Naming Users
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: ChatGPT's new chatbot feature has sparked a debate. Some users find the new feature unsettling, while others find it more personalized and intuitive than others. Some people don't like the idea of having a personalised conversation with ChatGPT.

articles.title: Big tech is going nuclear. Could Diablo Canyon be used to power AI in SLO County?
articles.author: The Tribune San Luis Obispo
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence is outpacing its own energy needs. Technology companies are turning to nuclear power for a potential clean-energy solution for AI's development.      Â   .   for a clean- energy solution.  For more information, visit nukefuture.com.

articles.title: Smarter ChatGPT: Revolutionizing Web Searches with Personalized Memory
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT is pushing the boundaries with a groundbreaking update that's set to redefine how we interact with AI for web searches. For cryptocurrency enthusiasts, the latest advancements in AI are not just interesting, but game-changing as well.

articles.title: Not waiting to be hired, India's youngest interns are creating
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: At Podar, the question is how to rediscover curiosity in the minds of sixth and seventh graders. In Lohum's labs, the story is about the unseen cost of our technology. Toppers are picked early on for short internships and placed where they can build.

articles.title: AI and art: An everlasting ethical debate
articles.author: The Jakarta Post
articles.summary: A new feature from OpenAI ChatGPT can generate images mimicking the iconic visual style of art, music and traditional crafts using artificial intelligence.   It mimics everything from art and lyrics to traditional crafts and is currently dominating the headlines. It is similar to a feature from Facebook Messenger that mimics images.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Unveiling the Groundbreaking AI Chatbot Revolutionizing Digital Interaction
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: ChatGPT is OpenAI's AI chatbot sensation. It has transformed from a simple text generator to a digital behemoth in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and blockchain.    For more information on ChatGPT, visit openai.com.

articles.title: Microsoft Copilot shows up even when it's not wanted
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: AI is becoming more and more of an unwanted party guest at Microsoft customers' parties. It's not just Microsoft customers anymore, it's all of us, too. It seems AI is unwanted guests at Microsoft's parties now.    iReport.com.

articles.title: Alarming Revelation: OpenAI's New Reasoning AI Models Face Worsening Hallucinations
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: OpenAI's new o3 and o4-mini AI models are cutting-edge in many ways, but they are struggling with increased AI hallucinations. They are working to improve their accuracy and reliability, especially in critical sectors such as cryptocurrency and finance.

articles.title: AI-Driven Incident Management: Transforming Cloud Security and Efficiency
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly reshaping how businesses manage cloud-based operations. AI is a transformative approach that enhances security, minimizes downtime and automates problem resolution. This article explores some of the most significant AI developments in this domain.

articles.title: The Rise And Rise Of Reinforcement Learning: AI's Quiet Revolution
articles.author: Paul X. McCarthy
articles.summary: Reinforcement Learning is reshaping artificial intelligence. It's an algorithm that explores, adjusts, and learns from feedback. Google used it to defeat the world's Go champion. In January 2025, DeepSeek unveiled a new Large Language Model trained using Reinforcement Learning. It rivals ChatGPT's performance while requiring significantly less computational power.

articles.title: The 1 Canadian Stock I'd Buy and Hold Forever in a TFSA for AI Exposure
articles.author: Amy Legate-Wolfe
articles.summary: WELL Health Technologies (TSX:WELL) is an AI-focused digital healthcare company. The company reports annual revenue of $919.7 million for the fiscal year of 2024. It also reports a record free cash flow attributable to its shareholders of $49.3 million. WELL Health expects its revenue to fall within the range of $1.4 billion to $ 1.5 billion for fiscal year 2025.
